Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ds-defensin  (D. silvarum defensin; UCSS1a; 3S=S, natural AMPs; hard ticks, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide most resembles (69.2% similarity)DefMT6. Mol Wt: 5792.689; Mol Extinction coeff 3355; mol formula: C240H393N85O69S6.Activity: Active against Gram+ B. pumilus CMCC63202 (MIC 1 uM), S. aureus CMCC26003 (MIC 20 uM), M. luteus CMCC63202 (MIC 50 uM), carbenicillin-resistant M. bovis (MIC 20 uM), Gram- S-typhimurium CVCC542 (MIC > 50 uM), P-aeruginosa CVCC2000 (MIC > 50 uM), E. coli, and fungi C-albicans (MIC > 50 uM). Updated 4/2024
Literature Information.Author: Wang J, Bian G, Pan W, Feng T, Dai J. 2015
Literature Information.Title: Molecular characterization of a defensin gene from a hard tick, Dermacentor silvarum.
